column4: Using Nautilus "Connect to server" I can connect to my NAS using samba protocol.. but when I go to Places Network the server doesn't show up there at all.. now... sometimes it does... why is this?
the thing you connected to will be in the left panel and should also appear on the desktop
after connecting yes.. prior to that Places>Network can't see it..
not sure then. You can add the device permanently in nautilus by making it a bookmark which is in the connect to server dialogue
